title: 23 of the funniest misheard song lyrics, from Ariana Grande to Elton John
text:
We all have that supremely irritating friend who belts out the wrong lyrics to songs when they play on the car radio or on a night out.

If this doesn’t sound familiar to you, then sorry, you are that irritating friend.

But don’t worry, from mixing up romantic sentiments with items of food to mistaking meaningful declarations for sexual innuendos, mishearing song lyrics is just part of what it is to be human.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Of all the lyrics in our round-up, it was songs by Ariana Grande, Elton John, Taylor Swift and Jimi Hendrix that people most often got badly wrong.

Check out our top 23 misheard song lyrics in the gallery below…

Shape Created with Sketch. 23 of the funniest misheard song lyrics Show all 23 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch. 23 of the funniest misheard song lyrics 1/23 “thank u, next” – Ariana Grande Correct lyric: “Thank you, next. Thank you, next. Thank you, next. I'm so f***in' grateful for my ex.” Misheard lyric: "Bacon, eggs. Bacon, eggs. Bacon, eggs. I'm so f***in’ grateful for my eggs.” 2/23 “I Try” – Macy Gray Correct lyric: “My world crumbles when you are not near.” Misheard lyric: “I wear goggles when you are not near.” 3/23 “Sex on Fire” – Kings of Leon Correct lyric: “Oooh, this sex is on fire.” Misheard lyric: “Oooh, dyslexics on fire.” 4/23 “Erase and Rewind” – The Cardigans Correct lyric: “Erase and rewind, 'cause I've been changing my mind.” Misheard lyric: “Raisins and wine, ‘cause I’ve been changing my mind.” 5/23 “Dancing Queen” – ABBA Correct lyric: “Dancing queen, feel the beat from the tambourine.” Misheard lyric: “Dancing queen, feel the beat from the tangerine.” 6/23 “I’m a Believer” – The Monkees Correct lyric: “Then I saw her face, now I’m a believer.” Misheard lyric: “Then I saw her face, now I’m gonna leave her.” 7/23 “Jeremy” – Pearl Jam Correct lyric: "Jeremy spoke in class today.” Misheard lyric: “Jeremy's smoking grass today." 8/23 “Africa” – Toto Correct lyric: “There's nothing that a hundred men or more could ever do.” Misheard lyric: “There’s nothing that a hundred men on mars could ever do.” 9/23 “Blank Space” by Taylor Swift Correct lyric: “Got a long list of ex-lovers, they’ll tell you I’m insane.” Misheard lyric: “Got a lot of Starbucks lovers, they’ll tell you I’m insane.” 10/23 “The Pretender” – Foo Fighters Correct lyric: “What if I say I'm not like the others?” Misheard lyric: “One of these things is not like the others.” 11/23 “Feel Good Inc” by The Gorillaz Correct lyric: “Feel good.” Misheard lyric: “Milk dud.” 12/23 “Blue” – Eiffel 65 Correct lyric: “I’m blue da ba dee da ba daa, da ba dee da ba daa, da ba dee da ba daa.” Misheard lyric: “I’m blue da ba dee da ba daa, in Aberdeen I will die, da ba dee da ba daa.” 13/23 “Blinded By the Light” – Manfred Mann’s Earth Band Correct lyric: “Revved up like a deuce, another runner in the night.” Misheard lyric: “Wrapped up like a douche when you’re rollin’ in the night.” 14/23 “Purple Haze” – Jimi Hendrix Correct lyric: “Scuse me, while I kiss the sky.” Misheard lyric: “Scuse me, while I kiss this guy.” 15/23 “Tiny Dancer” – Elton John Correct lyric: “Hold me closer tiny dancer.” Misheard lyric: “Hold me closer Tony Danza.” 16/23 “Say You Love Me” – Fleetwood Mac Correct lyric: “I'm begging you for a little sympathy.” Misheard lyric: “I’m begging you for a little sip of tea.” 17/23 “Chasing Pavements” – Adele Correct lyric: “Should I give up, or should I just keep chasing pavements?” Misheard lyric: “Should I give up, or should I just keep chasing penguins?” 18/23 “Livin’ On A Prayer” – Bon Jovi Correct lyric: “It doesn’t make a difference if we make it or not.” Misheard lyric: “It doesn’t make a difference if we’re naked or not.” Getty Images 19/23 “Baby Got Back” – Sir Mix-A-Lot Correct lyric: “I like big butts and I cannot lie.” Misheard lyric: “I like big butts in a can of limes.” 20/23 “Seven Seas of Rhye" – Queen Correct lyric: "I challenge the mighty titan and his troubadours.” Misheard lyric: "I challenge the mighty titan and his stupid horse.” Getty Images 21/23 “Bad Moon Rising” – Creedence Clearwater Revival Correct lyric: “There's a bad moon on the rise.” Misheard lyric: “There’s a bathroom on the right.” AFP/Getty Images 22/23 “Like a G6” – Far East Movement Correct lyric: “Now I'm feelin' so fly like a G6.” Misheard lyric: “Now I'm feelin' so fly like a cheese stick.” 23/23 “The Sidewinder Sleeps Tonite” – REM Correct lyric: “Call me when you try to wake her.” Misheard lyric: “Calling Jamaica.” Getty Images 1/23 “thank u, next” – Ariana Grande Correct lyric: “Thank you, next. Thank you, next. Thank you, next. I'm so f***in' grateful for my ex.” Misheard lyric: "Bacon, eggs. Bacon, eggs. Bacon, eggs. I'm so f***in’ grateful for my eggs.” 2/23 “I Try” – Macy Gray Correct lyric: “My world crumbles when you are not near.” Misheard lyric: “I wear goggles when you are not near.” 3/23 “Sex on Fire” – Kings of Leon Correct lyric: “Oooh, this sex is on fire.” Misheard lyric: “Oooh, dyslexics on fire.” 4/23 “Erase and Rewind” – The Cardigans Correct lyric: “Erase and rewind, 'cause I've been changing my mind.” Misheard lyric: “Raisins and wine, ‘cause I’ve been changing my mind.” 5/23 “Dancing Queen” – ABBA Correct lyric: “Dancing queen, feel the beat from the tambourine.” Misheard lyric: “Dancing queen, feel the beat from the tangerine.” 6/23 “I’m a Believer” – The Monkees Correct lyric: “Then I saw her face, now I’m a believer.” Misheard lyric: “Then I saw her face, now I’m gonna leave her.” 7/23 “Jeremy” – Pearl Jam Correct lyric: "Jeremy spoke in class today.” Misheard lyric: “Jeremy's smoking grass today." 8/23 “Africa” – Toto Correct lyric: “There's nothing that a hundred men or more could ever do.” Misheard lyric: “There’s nothing that a hundred men on mars could ever do.” 9/23 “Blank Space” by Taylor Swift Correct lyric: “Got a long list of ex-lovers, they’ll tell you I’m insane.” Misheard lyric: “Got a lot of Starbucks lovers, they’ll tell you I’m insane.” 10/23 “The Pretender” – Foo Fighters Correct lyric: “What if I say I'm not like the others?” Misheard lyric: “One of these things is not like the others.” 11/23 “Feel Good Inc” by The Gorillaz Correct lyric: “Feel good.” Misheard lyric: “Milk dud.” 12/23 “Blue” – Eiffel 65 Correct lyric: “I’m blue da ba dee da ba Correct lyric: “Revved up like a deuce, another runner in the night.” Misheard lyric: “Wrapped up like a douche when you’re rollin’ in the night.” 14/23 “Purple Haze” – Jimi Hendrix Correct lyric: “Scuse me, while I kiss the sky.” Misheard lyric: “Scuse me, while I kiss this guy.” 15/23 “Tiny Dancer” – Elton John Correct lyric: “Hold me closer tiny dancer.” Misheard lyric: “Hold me closer Tony Danza.” 16/23 “Say You Love Me” – Fleetwood Mac Correct lyric: “I'm begging you for a little sympathy.” Misheard lyric: “I’m begging you for a little sip of tea.” 17/23 “Chasing Pavements” – Adele Correct lyric: “Should I give up, or should I just keep chasing pavements?” Misheard lyric: “Should I give up, or should I just keep chasing penguins?” 18/23 “Livin’ On A Prayer” – Bon Jovi Correct lyric: “It doesn’t make a difference if we make it or not.” Misheard lyric: “It doesn’t make a difference if we’re naked or not.” Getty Images 19/23 “Baby Got Back” – Sir Mix-A-Lot Correct lyric: “I like big butts and I cannot lie.” Misheard lyric: “I like big butts in a can of limes.” 20/23 “Seven Seas of Rhye" – Queen Correct lyric: "I challenge the mighty titan and his troubadours.” Misheard “There’s a bathroom on the right.” AFP/Getty Images 22/23 “Like a G6” – Far East Movement Correct lyric: “Now I'm feelin' so fly like a G6.” Misheard lyric: “Now I'm feelin' so fly like a cheese
